other_title: きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード (Japanese)
plot: The love triangle continues in this series of episodes: Kyosuke exchanges body/mind with his fish and cat Jingoro, the three goes on a Hawaiian vacation and Hikaru gets kidnapped, Akane gets her cousin Kyosuke to pretend to be her boyfriend in front of her friends, Kyosuke swaps body with a pop idol, and Ayukawa is confused about men because she thinks her father is having an affair.
opening_theme: "鏡の中のアクトレス (Kagami no Nakano Actress; Actress in the Mirror)" by Meiko Nakahara (eps 1-2)
"チューズ・ミー (Choose Me)" by Yuiko Tsubokura (eps 3-8)
ending_theme: "Dance in the Memories" by Meiko Nakahara (eps 1-2)
"ときどきブルー (Tokidoki Blue; Sometimes Blue)" by Yuka Tachibana (eps 3-6)
"もうひとつのイエスタデイ (Mou Hitotsu no Yesterday; One More Yesterday)" by Kanako Wada (eps 7-8)
